::Striker/Ramulus::

Striker raises an eyebrow, looking over at Spears. "The only alternative to 
flying would be passing through three continents," he says, not realizing 
that she was terrified of flying. He keeps walking, the two getting closer to 
the pod.

"Don't worry," he says, "It seldom crashes."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus reaches Spears' pod, walking over to it. He frowns. With three bots, 
the pod would be easier to carry than with one. If they got Brix and Octociz 
split up first, they'd have three bots, including himself, to carry the pods.

"Briz/Octociz," he says into his comm-link as he gallops off toward the pod 
Octociz had detected, "I'm heading for the pod you found. After that, we'll 
need to carry another pod back to the Ark."
